meanings.definition: Relating to the arytenoid cartilage in the larynx.
meanings.sent1: The arytenoid cartilage is an important part of the larynx.
meanings.sent2: Her voice sounded different after the arytenoid surgery.
meanings.sent3: The singing teacher joked that her arytenoid cartilage was the key to hitting high notes.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the arytenoid cartilage in his throat.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that the arytenoid cartilage helps control vocal pitch.
